column4: Hello, Im new to linux. I need some help to build souce files. I have some source as tar.gz for some libraries and I want to build a binary for kubuntu. Any help?
what are yo utrying to build?
why would you want to rebuild them?
um, none of that actually mentions recompiling SDL, afaik
he recompiles after installing the SDL libraries... so maybe using them
But I don't know how he got that .pl file
did you install the sdl mixer library?
then ask them, it's not in ubuntu
I don't know where to find that mixer library. And the mixer one is a different person. The one that recompiles.. he is like me
where do any of them suggest recompiling SDL?
No they do not suggest recompile of SDL but recompile the file in nwn/lib folder using the SDL libraries... I think
that file is not on your hard disk
which is also not in ubuntu
: Not that would be a game file
